author: shuston
msg: Removed the Visual Studio solution/project files, as these are now generated by CMake. Added CMakeLists.txt files to Makefile.am, and all other needed support files so that the 'make dist' supplies all needed items for building a release kit on Windows. Fixes QPID-2134
